Bad Robot

From happy clients

Luisa is an energetic and outgoing individual. With a passion for sports, well being and exercise Luisa marries this with copy creation. Luisa is always eager to understand the audience and provide engaging content.

Nadia De Wouters IT Project Manager at David Lloyd Leisure

I had the pleasure of working alongside Luisa whilst at David Lloyd Leisure, where she was contracted to take on the task of content creation, manipulation and management during our transfer to a new website and associated CMS system.

Despite not working directly with her on this project it is very clear to see that she is loved across the business, has been thrown in at the deep end and handled it all with great professionalism and achieved great results.

Luisa has an innate ability to bring people together and she has had a tremendously positive effect on the business in all departments, even those that do not relate directly to her daily tasks.

Matthew Beedham Partnership Manager at David Lloyd Leisure

Luisa is a very friendly, highly outgoing person who gets on with everyone. She works very hard at what she does, taking genuine pride in the results. She always is enthusiastic to learn whatever she can and is quick to come up with solutions to problems.

Luisa is a genuine pleasure to work with, and is consistent with her dedication and high quality of work in whatever she is tasked to do.

Adrian Callaghan Freelance Web Developer

I have worked with Luisa for a few months now at David Lloyd Leisure and we hit it off from the start! She is a very energetic and engaging person which shows in her work ethic also.

She is not afraid of trying new things which is a very important quality to have when working in creating new and exciting content.

Genevieve Braine Junior Digital Marketing Executive

Luisa is a results-oriented, highly capable copywriter, with tons of enthusiasm and focus. Her bright and friendly personality make her an incredible addition to any team, as she gets on with everybody and leverages her relationships to make better products.

I need a Luisa on all the teams I work with!

Yael Levey Senior UX Designer, BBC

Luisa is not just extremely knowledgeable but also very precise, clear and on the totally on the ball when delivering content. Her spoken and written language is second to none and she goes over all her work with a fine comb, you can guarantee that what you get will be spot on and without errors or issues.

When first meeting Luisa you initially get the impression that this is not just her day job but also her passion. I cannot recommend her enough. Luisa is not just a joy to work with, she's very out going, social, friendly and brings that much needed enthusiasm and spark to the team.

Eugene Stickney Senior Digital Designer
